definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Xylitol also appears to have potential as a treatment for osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 木糖醇似乎有治癒骨質疏鬆的潛力。

sentences.english: The work will exert innovative influences on the future industry application of xylose production.
sentences.chinese: 這些結果對於未來的木糖工業生產應用有重要的意義。

sentences.english: The fermentation of corncob hydrolysate to xylitol was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對用玉米芯水解液發酵木糖醇進行了研究。

sentences.english: Xylitol is widely-used in sugar-free products sold in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 木糖醇廣泛用於英國銷售的無糖產品。

sentences.english: The xylitol fermentation broth was carried out static state discoloring by using activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 研究用活性碳對木糖醇發酵液的分批脫色。

sentences.english: In this paper, we describe the strategies of xylose metabolic engineering and sum up the progress in construction of xylose utilisation recombinant strains.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了木糖代謝工程菌的研究進展和策略。

sentences.english: The wood sugars are removed and the lignosulfonate is used as a clay deflocculant.
sentences.chinese: 去掉木糖，木質素磺酸鹽可用作粘土解絮凝劑。

sentences.english: The xylose does not go unused, however.
sentences.chinese: 但是，木糖不會被浪費的。

sentences.english: Xylitol natural ingredients, to the comprehensive protection of the teeth, moth Glister.
sentences.chinese: 天然木糖醇成分，能全面保護牙齒，防蛀健齒。

sentences.english: The hydrogenation of xylose aqueous solution has been studied in pressure elevated trickle bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 本文對滴流牀中壓加氫生產木糖醇的工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: And the xylo-oligosaccharides had hardly scavenging effects on DPPH radicals.
sentences.chinese: 低聚木糖對DPPH自由基幾乎沒有清除能力。

sentences.english: In S. cerevisiae glucose transporters mediate xylose uptake.
sentences.chinese: 在啤酒酵母中，葡萄糖轉運因子調解木糖攝取。

sentences.english: In the acid hydrolysis, xylose is the main raw material for preparation of xylitol.
sentences.chinese: 在稀酸中水解，得木糖，是製備木糖醇的主要原料。

sentences.english: In the acid hydrolysis, xylose is the main raw material for preparation of xylitol.
sentences.chinese: 在稀酸中水解，得木糖，是製備木糖醇的主要原料。

sentences.english: Unlike most sugar molecules which are based on a six-carbon structure, Xylitol is based on five carbon atoms.
sentences.chinese: 和大部分六碳糖分子不同，木糖醇是以五碳爲骨架的。

sentences.english: Xylitol can help kill off, or starve the bacteria living on our teeth.
sentences.chinese: 木糖醇有助於消滅或抑制牙齒細菌。

definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
